name: Veggie Boy in Meat World (GDKO RND 1)
name_original: Veggie Boy in Meat World (GDKO RND 1)
description:
Bounce and Jump around in the art prototype for this GDKO game!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move + Jump (Space as a optional jump key)
Directional pad or Analogue stick for move + Jump (A/X as a optional jump button)

It's very WIP at the moment, I'm really happy with the art but the itch cover logo and gameplay is 100% not final, this does not represent the final product. Thanks again!
